block.p: MALINA-Jean. On August 30, 2000. Beloved wife of the late William. Loving mother of Michael and Anita, and Robert and Fran. Dear sister of Anne. Cherished grandmother of Rachel (Edwin), Stuart (Martha), Toby, Joel (Nancy), Joshua (Melissa) and Nicole. Adoring great grandmother of six. Beloved aunt. Service on Friday 12:45 PM at ''The Riverside'', 76th Street and Amsterdam Avenue.

MALINA-Jean. Yeshivas Bais Yisroel, Jerusalem, Israel mourn the death of Jean Malina, beloved wife of the late William and extends heartfelt condolences to the entire family. Rabbi Doniel Lehrfield, Rosh Yeshiva
